00026 class AppSettings
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         typedef enum
00030         {
00031                 EXT_TRIGGER_MSK=                0x0001,                         // external trigger
00032                 CHANNEL_TRIGGER_MSK=    0x0002,                         // Channels trigger
00033                 SW_AUTO_TRIGGER_MSK=    0x0004,                         // Software auto retrigger
00034         } TRIGGER_MSK;
00035         typedef enum
00036         {
00037                 NO_TRIGGER= 0,
00038                 RISING_EDGE,
00039                 FALLING_EDGE,
00040         } TRIGGER_EDGE_TYPE;
00041         typedef enum
00042         {
00043                 NO_LINE= 0,
00044                 SOLID,
00045                 DASHED,
00046                 DASH_DOT,
00047                 DOTTED,
00048         } GRID_LINE_TYPE;
00049

00066 
00067         inline UINT32 Sec2Pix( int scope_index, double value){ return (UINT32)(double)( this->m_sec_2_pix[ scope_index]* value);};
00068         inline double Sample2Sec( int value){ return this->m_sample_2_sec* (double)value;};
